tag.name: Bing Ads UET - Add to cart tracking

parameter.value:
<script type="text/javascript" src="//static.criteo.net/js/ld/ld.js" async="true"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];

	var criteo_params_array = {{Criteo - Object params}};
	for(var index in criteo_params_array) { 
    	window.criteo_q.push(criteo_params_array[index]); 
      	console.log(criteo_params_array[index]);
  	}
</script>

<script>
  var track_name = {{datalayer.fb_pixel_track_name}};
  var track_info = {{datalayer.fb_pixel_track_info}};
  fbq('track', '{{datalayer.fb_pixel_track_name}}', track_info);
</script>

tag.name: FB - Audience pixel - Add to cart

parameter.value:
<script>
	var track_info = {{datalayer.addToCart}};
  	var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
	var object = {};
  
	if(typeof track_info.id != 'undefined')
		object.content_ids = track_info.id;
  	if(typeof track_info.name != 'undefined')
		object.content_name = track_info.name;

	object.content_type = 'product';
  	object.currency = currency;
  	object.value = track_info.price;
  
	fbq('track', 'AddToCart', object);
</script>

tag.name: FB - Audience pixel - Add to wishlist

parameter.value:
<script>
	var track_info = {{datalayer.addToWishlist}};
  	var currency = {{datalayer.current_currency}};
	var object = {};
  
	if(typeof track_info.id != 'undefined')
		object.content_ids = track_info.id;
  	if(typeof track_info.name != 'undefined')
		object.content_name = track_info.name;

	object.content_type = 'product';
  	object.currency = currency;
  	object.value = track_info.price;
	fbq('track', 'AddToWishlist', object);
</script>

<script>
(function(){
	var obj = {{Google - Rich snippets object}};
      if(obj)
      {
        var script = document.createElement('script');
    	script.type = "application/ld+json";
    	script.innerHTML = JSON.stringify(obj);
    	document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script); 
      }
  })(document);
</script>

<script src="https://apis.google.com/js/platform.js?onload=renderOptIn" async defer></script>

<script>
  var order_sucess = {{datalayer.orderSuccess}};

  var targetDate = new Date(order_success.date_added);
  targetDate.setDate(targetDate.getDate() + {{Google Reviews - Delivery days}});
  var dd = targetDate.getDate() > 9 ? targetDate.getDate() : '0'+targetDate.getDate();
  var mm = targetDate.getMonth() > 9 ? targetDate.getMonth() : '0'+targetDate.getMonth();
  mm = mm == '00' ? '01' : mm;
  var yyyy = targetDate.getFullYear();
  var dateString = yyyy+'-'+mm+'-'+dd;
  
  window.renderOptIn = function() { 
    window.gapi.load('surveyoptin', function() {
      window.gapi.surveyoptin.render(
        {
          // REQUIRED
          "merchant_id":{{Google Reviews - Merchant ID}},
          "order_id": order_sucess.order_id,
          "email": order_success.email,
          "delivery_country": order_success.payment_iso_code_2,
          "estimated_delivery_date": dateString,

          // OPTIONAL
          "opt_in_style": "{{Google Reviews - Style}}"
        }); 
     });
  }
</script>
